entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High plus 3.
